title: Apple sales miss for first time since 2018, stock falls after earnings
text:
Amazon earnings drop the most in four years and holiday forecast disappoints, sending stock south

Amazon.com Inc. missed expectations on profit and sales for the third quarter as its profit declined by the largest percentage in more than four years, the retailer announced Thursday, while also delivering a disappointing holiday forecast. See full story.

Here's how Congress wants to combat early withdrawals from retirement accounts

Early distributions are taxed at ordinary income rates and face penalties, too See full story.

What's worth streaming in November 2021: ‘Cowboy Bebop,' ‘Hawkeye,' ‘Wheel of Time' and much more

Get ready to splurge, because there's a loaded menu of top-grade shows on the way from almost every streaming service. See full story.

This city just recorded the U.S.'s highest-ever average gasoline price

Prices for gasoline in one of the nation's major cities reached an all-time on Thursday

---

the highest average price ever recorded in the United States, according to fuel savings platform GasBuddy. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

David Lesh has admitted taunting the National Forest Service with stunts to promote his ski-gear company. See full story.
